title: Ole faithful
content: I've been using this box / brand for years since I stared my cycle. Only because it was the brand and style I essentially trained on, I wanted nothing else. This brand and product has been nothing but reliable over the past 14 years and seem to still do the job. I love the variety that it comes it because that can be forever depending on Mother Nature and you just never know. These are simple to use, easy, pain free, and reliable.
